channel.title: Vote4Cash Custom edit
channel.description:
So I want to add my own vote for cash. Not like the tutorial where you just vote on one site. One where you click on all links (and vote hopefully) then the button lights up and allows you to claim your points etc.
I know this deals with java script I just can't put my finger on how to do this.

item.title: Vote4Cash Custom edit
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’ll try again.
Say your playing my server. And you type ::vote.
That would take you to the vote page where you:

  1. Type in your username
  2. Vote on all the links.
  3. button lights up allowing to click when all links have been used
  4. you click button. go on server and redeem.

Make sense?

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4Cash Custom edit
item.dc:creator: @Nathan_R Nathan R
item.description:
@Nathan_R wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:1, topic:428368”]So I want to add my own vote for cash. Not like the tutorial where you just vote on one site. One where you click on all links (and vote hopefully) then the button lights up and allows you to claim your points etc.

I know this deals with java script I just can’t put my finger on how to do this.[/quote]
I don’t get what your asking? A server message displaying all the vote links, hence the players can click them, one by one? Explain please.

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4Cash Custom edit
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well that’s like a givin. I’m saying I want it so when someone does ::vote it takes them to the vote webpage. And they have to click (and hopefully vote) on x amount of links. After all links have been clicked the button to enter your username (You could type in your username when ever) onto the server and make it so you can type ::redeem or what ever.

Read full topic
